page.title: 20CREDITS
page.content: The Project was co-ordinated by Barry Thomas (Humanities Department). The following teachers assisted:Dick Foweather,John Green,Ann Albert, Heather McKenzie,Jeff Marsh,Mike Turner,Dave Trotter,Mike Peck and Jean McDiarmid. Mike Hamilton provided the computer expertise. The following classes took part: 3R1,3M1,3R3,2M1,2R2,1Bos &1BelR. Kalpana Mistry,James McRobie,Avtar Singh,Andrew Cook,Wayne Marson,Phillip Allcock,Jane Warden,Alaka Patel,and Amit Popat all helped to write "pages". The photographs were taken by Shabdeep Batty(A,B & D) and Graham Meek(C). Jackie McWilliams collated the survey information. Thanks to the residents of Valley House,Rushey Mead and Humberstone Library staff.
